DEPTH = 2048;                 -- The size of memory in words
WIDTH = 32;                   -- The size of data in bits
ADDRESS_RADIX = HEX;          -- The radix for address values
DATA_RADIX = BIN;             -- The radix for data values
CONTENT                       -- start of (address : data pairs)
BEGIN
                
00 : 01010000000000000000000000000000;   -- memory address : data
01 : 01010000001000010000000000000000;
02 : 01010000010000100000000000000000;
03 : 01010000011000110000000000000000;
04 : 01010000100001000000000000000000;
05 : 01010000101001010000000000000000;
06 : 01010000110001100000000000000000;
07 : 01010000111001110000000000000000;
08 : 01010100001000010000000000000001;
09 : 01010100100001000000000000010011;
0A : 01100100000000010000000000000000;
0B : 01010100001000010000000000000010;
0C : 01010001000000100000000000000001;
0D : 01000000010000000000000000000100;
0E : 00110100000000000000000010000100;
0F : 01010001000000100000000000000010;
10 : 01000000010000000000000000000100;
11 : 00110100000000000000000101011000;
12 : 01010001000000100000000000000100;
13 : 01000000010000000000000000000100;
14 : 00110100000000000000001000111100;

19 : 01001000101001010000000000000001;

2B : 01001100010000100000000000000001;

2D : 01010001000000000110000000000000;

2F : 01001100000000000000000000000001;
